"Has your ship aout-defences?"asked Nightlight



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  Vampirtron:
>      "I have no group," He said, pausing, "So to speak. I'm a free 
agent. Although I must say, I am glad that a maximal came to pick me 
up. I do truely dislike the Predacons. Now as for my ship, I think 
it's in good order, I doubt that she'd fly again, but may be good for 
spare parts. I have no need for it, so you may have it."
>      He walked over to the ship to give it a once over, "Although I 
don't think that we're going to be able to carry it. Perhaps you 
would get some help. My destress call was broadcast on a common 
channel. The Predacons might come to get me too. I don't want to 
fight right now."
>   airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: Nightlight::
> 
> 
> "I'm Nightlight, I'm a maximal"replied the femme while she shook 
her 
> hands "What's your group?"
>
